name: Codex Navigator
quote: Every workflow is a constellation—connect the stars and the automation draws itself.

sunoPrompt.template: Write a [genre] song about [silly anecdote] with [mood/style] vibes
sunoPrompt.example: Write a comedic folk song about a robot who accidentally painted all the clouds purple while trying to fix a weather machine, with whimsical banjo and kazoo accompaniment
guidelines: Keep it under 200 characters for best results
Include genre, mood, and specific musical elements
Make the anecdote silly and memorable
sunoPrompt.yourPrompt: Write a glittery synth-pop anthem about a terminal wizard who juggled four AI agents at once and celebrated each passing test with a goofy dance, featuring vocoders and sparkling arpeggios

tencent3DPrompt.template: A [adjective] humanoid [character type], [physical features], [clothing/accessories], [pose/expression], biped character, game-ready, full body
tencent3DPrompt.example: A wise humanoid owl sage, with large golden eyes and brown feathers, wearing a tattered blue wizard robe with glowing runes, holding an ancient staff, confident standing pose, biped character, game-ready, full body
guidelines: MUST be humanoid biped (two legs, upright posture)
Avoid overly complex or abstract concepts
Mention 'game-ready' and 'full body' for best results
tencent3DPrompt.yourPrompt: A teal-skinned humanoid adventurer with oversized lavender eyes shaped like parentheses, gradient mohawk shifting from electric blue to neon magenta, wearing a holographic explorer jacket covered in CLI panels, asymmetrical leggings and silver enter-key boots, tiny hovering cursor drones above shoulders, holding glowing command scrolls, joyful curious expression, biped character, game-ready, full body

taskCompleted: CLI-UX-001 – Built the Rich-powered local agent CLI and multi-agent dispatcher
